00023 ISR(TIMER2_OVF_vect)
00024 {
00025         checkDistance();
00026 
00027         //2sec
00028         if((voltageCheck++) >= 120){
00029                 voltageCheck = 0;
00030                 double volt = 0;
00031                 //get currente voltage value
00032                 bot_update();
00033                 //calculate the voltage from adc-value
00034                 volt = 0.0166 * bot_supply -1.19;
00035                 if( volt <= 8.5){
00036                         tone(3000,100);
00037                 }
00038         }

00045 void initBot() {
00046 
00047         bot_init();
00048         sei();
00049 
00050         //display init
00051         advDisplay_init();
00052         advDisplay_printVoltage();
00053         advDisplay_append_line("Martini!");
00054         advDisplay_append_line("Init...");
00055         delay(1000);
00056 
00057         //copro init
00058         spi_init();
00059         advDisplay_append_line("Motor      OK");
00060         delay(500);
00061 
00062         //niboCom init
00063         niboCom_init();
00064         advDisplay_append_line("XBEE       OK");
00065         delay(500);
00066 
00067         //sound init
00068         sound_init();
00069         advDisplay_append_line("Audio      OK");
00070         delay(500);
00071 
00072         //ir sensor init
00073         copro_ir_startMeasure();
00074         advDisplay_append_line("Sensoren   OK");
00075         delay(500);
00076 
00077         //nds3 init
00078         ndsScan_init();
00079         advDisplay_append_line("NDS        OK");
00080         delay(500);
00081 
00082         //led init
00083         leds_init();
00084         advDisplay_append_line("LEDS       OK");
00085         delay(500);
00086 
00087         //Timer-interrupt init
00088         // set Prescaler 1024
00089         TCCR2 = ((1<<CS22)|(0<<CS21)|(1<<CS20));
00090         //enable Timer-Overflow-Interrupt
00091         TIMSK |= (1<<TOIE2);
00092         advDisplay_append_line("Interrupts OK");
00093 
00094         advDisplay_append_line("Bereit!");
00095         delay(1000);
00096         advDisplay_clear();
00097 }

00102 int main() {
00103 
00104         //current cmd
00105         uint8_t cmd = niboCom_cmd_none;
00106 
00107         initBot();
00108 
00109 
00110         while (1) {
00111 
00112                 //catch command via xbee
00113                 cmd = niboCom_getCMD();
00114                 advDisplay_printVoltage();
00115 
00116                 //check whether mode has to be changed or not
00117                 if(cmd == niboCom_cmd_nibo_auto){
00118                         mode = MODE_AUTO;
00119                         advDisplay_append_line("-> Automatik");
00120                 }
00121                 //Button S3
00122                 else if((PIND & (1 << PD4)) == 0){
00123                         mode = MODE_AUTO;
00124                         advDisplay_append_line("-> Automatik");
00125                         delay(500);
00126                 }
00127 
00128                 //auto mode loop
00129                 while(mode == MODE_AUTO){
00130                         //check for new commands via xbee
00131                         cmd = niboCom_getCMD();
00132                         advDisplay_printVoltage();
00133 
00134                         //check whether mode has to be changed or not
00135                         if(cmd == niboCom_cmd_nibo_man){
00136                                 mode = MODE_MAN;
00137                                 advDisplay_append_line("-> Manuell");
00138                                 copro_stop();
00139                                 break;
00140                         }
00141                         //Button S3
00142                         else if((PIND & (1 << PD4)) == 0){
00143                                 mode = MODE_MAN;
00144                                 advDisplay_append_line("-> Manuell");
00145                                 copro_stop();
00146                                 delay(500);
00147                                 break;
00148                         }
00149                         //command nds scan
00150                         if(cmd == niboCom_cmd_nds_distance){
00151                                 nds_scan = ndsScan(NDS_SCAN_DEG);
00152                                 niboCom_putNDSDistance((180/NDS_SCAN_DEG)+1,nds_scan);
00153                         }
00154 
00155                         //drive around ;-)
00156                         autoMode();
00157 
00158                 }//end auto mode loop
00159 
00160 
00161                 //manual mode -> command execution
00162 
00163                 //command nds scan
00164                 if(cmd == niboCom_cmd_nds_distance){
00165                         nds_scan = ndsScan(NDS_SCAN_DEG);
00166                         niboCom_putNDSDistance((180/NDS_SCAN_DEG)+1,nds_scan);
00167                 }
00168                 //command drive until obstacle
00169                 else if(cmd == niboCom_cmd_nibo_drive){
00170                         uint8_t driveStatus = drive_front_free;
00171                         //drive loop
00172                         while(driveStatus == drive_front_free){
00173                                 //check for new commands via xbee
00174                                 cmd = niboCom_getCMD();
00175                                 //command is not stop-command
00176                                 if(cmd != niboCom_cmd_nibo_stop){
00177                                         driveStatus = drive(20);
00178                                 }
00179                                 //command stop
00180                                 else{
00181                                         copro_stop();
00182                                         break;
00183                                 }
00184                                 //command nds scan
00185                                 if(cmd == niboCom_cmd_nds_distance){
00186                                         nds_scan = ndsScan(NDS_SCAN_DEG);
00187                                         niboCom_putNDSDistance((180/NDS_SCAN_DEG)+1,nds_scan);
00188                                 }
00189                         }//end drive loop
00190 
00191                 }
00192                 //command turn left
00193                 else if(cmd == niboCom_cmd_nibo_left){
00194                         drive_turn_left();
00195                 }
00196                 //command turn half left
00197                 else if(cmd == niboCom_cmd_nibo_halfLeft){
00198                         drive_turn_halfLeft();
00199                 }
00200                 //command turn right
00201                 else if(cmd == niboCom_cmd_nibo_halfRight){
00202                         drive_turn_halfRight();
00203                 }
00204                 //command turn half right
00205                 else if(cmd == niboCom_cmd_nibo_right){
00206                         drive_turn_right();
00207                 }
00208                 //command turn around
00209                 else if(cmd == niboCom_cmd_nibo_turn){
00210                         drive_turn_around();
00211                 }
00212 
00213         }
00214 }

00219 void autoMode(){
00220         uint8_t cmd = niboCom_cmd_none;
00221     uint8_t driveStatus = drive_all_blocked;
00222     //try to drive forward
00223     drive(20);
00224     //get path for the nibo
00225     driveStatus = drive_getFreePath();
00226 
00227     //front is blocked but right is free
00228     if(driveStatus == drive_right_free){
00229                 drive_turn_halfRight();
00230         }
00231     //front is blocked but left is free
00232         else if(driveStatus == drive_left_free){
00233                 drive_turn_halfLeft();
00234         }
00235     //front, right and left side of the nibo are blocked
00236         else if(driveStatus == drive_all_blocked){
00237                 //drive backwarts loop
00238                 while(1){
00239 
00240                         //check for new commands via xbee
00241                         cmd = niboCom_getCMD();
00242                         advDisplay_printVoltage();
00243 
00244                         //check whether mode has to be changed or not
00245                         if(cmd == niboCom_cmd_nibo_man){
00246                                 mode = MODE_MAN;
00247                                 advDisplay_append_line("-> Manuell");
00248                                 copro_stop();
00249                                 break;
00250                         }
00251                         //Button S3
00252                         else if((PIND & (1 << PD4)) == 0){
00253                                 mode = MODE_MAN;
00254                                 advDisplay_append_line("-> Manuell");
00255                                 copro_stop();
00256                                 delay(500);
00257                                 break;
00258                         }
00259                         //command nds scan
00260                         if(cmd == niboCom_cmd_nds_distance){
00261                                 nds_scan = ndsScan(NDS_SCAN_DEG);
00262                                 niboCom_putNDSDistance((180/NDS_SCAN_DEG)+1,nds_scan);
00263                         }
00264 
00265                         //drive backwarts
00266                         copro_setTargetRel(-10, -10, 10);
00267                         delay(1500);
00268 
00269                         //turn right if free
00270                         if(drive_isRightFree()){
00271                                 copro_stop();
00272                                 drive_turn_halfRight();
00273                                 break;
00274                         }
00275                         //turn left if free
00276                         else if(drive_isLeftFree()){
00277                                 copro_stop();
00278                                 drive_turn_halfLeft();
00279                                 break;
00280                         }
00281                 }
00282         }
00283 }

00288 void checkDistance(){
00289         copro_update();
00290 
00291         //right
00292         if((copro_distance[0]/256) > IRDistance){leds_set_status(LEDS_RED,7);}
00293         else{leds_set_status(LEDS_GREEN,7);}
00294 
00295         //half right
00296         if((copro_distance[1]/256) > IRDistance){leds_set_status(LEDS_RED,6);}
00297         else{leds_set_status(LEDS_GREEN,6);}
00298 
00299         //front
00300         if((copro_distance[2]/256) > IRDistance){leds_set_status(LEDS_RED,5);leds_set_status(LEDS_RED,4);}
00301         else{leds_set_status(LEDS_GREEN,5);leds_set_status(LEDS_GREEN,4);}
00302 
00303         //half left
00304         if((copro_distance[3]/256) > IRDistance){leds_set_status(LEDS_RED,3);}
00305         else{leds_set_status(LEDS_GREEN,3);}
00306 
00307         //left
00308         if((copro_distance[4]/256) > IRDistance){leds_set_status(LEDS_RED,2);}
00309         else{leds_set_status(LEDS_GREEN,2);}
00310 
00311 }
